engineersdecor.config.title: Engineer's Decor Config
engineersdecor.tooltip.slabpickup.help: §rFast pickup by left-clicking while looking up/down and holding this slab.
block.engineersdecor.clinker_brick_block:
§6A brick block with position dependent texture variations.§r
Looks slightly darker and more color intensive than the vanilla brick block.
block.engineersdecor.clinker_brick_stain:
§6A brick block with position dependent texture variations.§r
Looks slightly darker and more color intensive than the vanilla brick block. Has more visible traces of grime or stain.
block.engineersdecor.slag_brick_block.he: §6A gray-brown brick block with position dependent texture variations.
block.engineersdecor.rebar_concrete.help: §6Steel reinforced concrete block.§r Expensive but Creeper-proof like obsidian.
block.engineersdecor.panzerglass_block.h: §6Reinforced glass block.§r Expensive, explosion-proof. Dark gray tint, faint structural lines visible, multi texture for seemless look.
block.engineersdecor.rebar_concrete_tile: §6Steel reinforced concrete tile.§r Expensive but Creeper-proof like obsidian.
§6Slab made from a Clinker Block.§r
Looks slightly darker and more color intensive than the vanilla brick.
block.engineersdecor.clinker_brick_stain: §6Slab made from a Stained Clinker Block.
block.engineersdecor.rebar_concrete_slab: §6Steel reinforced concrete slab.§r Expensive but Creeper-proof like obsidian.
block.engineersdecor.rebar_concrete_tile: §6Steel reinforced concrete tile slab.§r Expensive but Creeper-proof like obsidian.
block.engineersdecor.panzerglass_slab.he: §6Reinforced glass slab.§r Expensive, explosion-proof. Dark gray tint, faint structural lines visible.
block.engineersdecor.rebar_concrete_wall: §6Steel reinforced concrete wall.§r Expensive but Creeper-proof like obsidian.
block.engineersdecor.metal_rung_ladder.h: §6Typical industrial wall ladder, consisting of horizontal metal rod rungs.§r Look up/down to climb faster.
block.engineersdecor.metal_rung_steps.he: §6Staggered rod rungs affixed to a wall, allowing to climb up, fall down, and so on.§r Look up/down to climb faster.
block.engineersdecor.treated_wood_ladder: §6Weather-proof wooden ladder.§r Look up/down to climb faster.
block.engineersdecor.clinker_brick_stair: §6Looks slightly darker and more color intensive than the vanilla brick block.
block.engineersdecor.clinker_brick_stain: §6Looks slightly darker and more color intensive than the vanilla brick block. Has more visible traces of grime or stain.
block.engineersdecor.slag_brick_stairs.h: §6Looks slightly darker and more color intensive than the vanilla brick block.
block.engineersdecor.rebar_concrete_stai: §6Steel reinforced concrete stairs.§r Expensive but Creeper-proof like obsidian.
block.engineersdecor.rebar_concrete_tile: §6Steel reinforced concrete tile stairs.§r Expensive but Creeper-proof like obsidian.
block.engineersdecor.treated_wood_pole.h:
§6Straight pole fragment with a diameter of a wire relay.§r
 Can be useful as alternative to the wire posts if special lengths are needed, or as support for structures.
block.engineersdecor.treated_wood_pole_h: §6Wooden part fitting as foot or head of straight poles.
block.engineersdecor.treated_wood_pole_s: §6Heavy duty wooden support part fitting as foot or head of straight poles.
block.engineersdecor.thick_steel_pole.he: §6Straight hollow pole fragment (6x6x16) for structural support purposes.
block.engineersdecor.thin_steel_pole.hel: §6Straight hollow pole fragment (4x4x16) for structural support purposes.
block.engineersdecor.thin_steel_pole_hea: §6Steel part fitting as foot or head of the thin steel pole (4x4x16).
block.engineersdecor.thick_steel_pole_he: §6Steel part fitting as foot or head of the thick steel pole (6x6x16).
§6Robust four-legged wood table.§r Indoor and outdoor use.
block.engineersdecor.steel_floor_grating: §6Decorative steel floor covering.§r Top aligned. Items fall through.
§6Robust Wood Stool.§r Indoor and outdoor use.
block.engineersdecor.treated_wood_crafti:
§6Robust and weather-proof.§r Eight storage slots, keeps inventory, no vanilla recipe book.
 Click up/down arrow buttons for crafting history selection, output slot for item placement, X-button to clear crafting grid and history. Shift-click stack: player-to-storage stack transfer when crafting grid empty, otherwise player-to-grid stack transfer. Automatically distributes the clicked stack.
block.engineersdecor.iron_inset_light.he:
§6Small glowstone light source, sunk into the floor, ceiling or wall.§r
 Useful to light up places where electrical light installations are problematic. Light level like a torch.
block.engineersdecor.treated_wood_window: §6Wood framed triple glazed window. Well insulating.§r Does not connect to adjacent blocks like glass panes.
block.engineersdecor.steel_framed_window: §6Steel framed triple glazed window. Well insulating. §r Does not connect to adjacent blocks like glass panes.
block.engineersdecor.small_lab_furnace.h: §6Small metal cased lab kiln.§r Solid fuel consuming, updraught. Slightly hotter and better isolated than a cobblestone furnace, therefore more efficient. Two auxiliary slots e.g. for storage. Two stack internal hopper fifos for input, output, and fuel. Place an external heater into a aux slot and connect power for electrical smelting speed boost.
block.engineersdecor.small_electrical_fu: §6Small metal cased pass-through furnace.§r Automatically draws items from the input side and puts items into the inventory at the output side. Items can be inserted or drawn from all sides using hoppers. Implicitly bypasses items that cannot be smelted or cooked to the output. Slightly more energy efficient and faster than a heated cobblestone furnace. Fifos and feeders transfer whole stacks. Feeders require a bit of power.
block.engineersdecor.small_waste_inciner: §6Trash with internal fifo slots.§r Items can be inserted on all sides, and are kept until there is no space left in the fifo. After that the oldest stack will be incinerated. Apply electrical RF/FE power to increase the processing speed. Keeps its inventory when being relocated.
block.engineersdecor.straight_pipe_valve: §6Straight fluid pipe fragment.§r Conducts fluids only in one direction. Does not connect to the sides. Reduces flow rate. Sneak to place in reverse direction.
§6Straight fluid pipe fragment.§r Conducts fluids only in one direction. Does not connect to the sides. Sneak to place in reverse direction. Blocks if not redstone powered.

§6Straight fluid pipe fragment.§r Conducts fluids only in one direction. Does not connect to the sides. Sneak to place in reverse direction. Blocks if not redstone powered, reduces the flow rate linear from power 1 to 14, opens to maximum possible valve flow rate for power 15.
block.engineersdecor.passive_fluid_accum: §6Vacuum suction based fluid collector.§r Has one output, all other sides are input. Drains fluids from adjacent tanks when being drained from the output port by a pump.
block.engineersdecor.factory_dropper.hel: §6Dropper suitable for advanced factory automation.§r Has twelve round-robin selected slots. Drop force, angle, stack size, and cool-down delay adjustable in the GUI. Three stack compare slots with logical AND or OR can be used as internal trigger source. Internal trigger can be AND'ed or OR'ed with the external redstone signal trigger. Trigger simulation buttons for testing. Pre-opens shutter door when internal trigger conditions are met. Drops all matching stacks simultaneously. Click on all elements in the GUI to see how it works.
block.engineersdecor.small_mineral_smelt:
§6High temperature, high insulation electrical stone melting furnace.§r
 Heats up mineral blocks to magma blocks, and finally to lava. Due to the miniturized device size the process is rather inefficient - much time and energy is needed to liquefy a stone block.
block.engineersdecor.sign_decor.help: §6This should not be craftable or visible in JEI. Used for creative tab and screenshots.
block.engineersdecor.sign_hotwire.help: §6Electrical hazard warning. Don't forget to place around HV, or you will have a nonconformity in the next audit.
block.engineersdecor.sign_defense.help: §6Warning sign for turrets, Tesla Coils, and traps.
block.engineersdecor.halfslab_rebar_conc: §6Vertically stackable slice.§r Right/left click with the slice stack on the top or bottom surface to add/remove slices.
block.engineersdecor.halfslab_concrete.h: §6Vertically stackable slice.§r Right/left click with the slice stack on the top or bottom surface to add/remove slices.

block.engineersdecor.halfslab_sheetmetal: §6Vertically stackable slice.§r Right/left click with the slice stack on the top or bottom surface to add/remove slices.
§6Vertically stackable slice.§r Right/left click with the slice stack on the top or bottom surface to add/remove slices.
